title: All Working Group Meeting
details: Join us every Monday night at Uptwinkles for dinner and our planning meeting. Meetings are open to all members of LP working groups, or anyone who has input to share on a particular topic to be discussed. We ask that you review our latest agenda prior to the meeting.
RSVP: Please let Mary Kate know if you plan to attend, so we can account for you in the dinner plan!

title: Monthly Day of Action
details: Take action for animals! Join Liberation Philly in our monthly day of action, a non-violent protest aimed at raising public discourse around animal rights. Please arive at Uptinkles at 1:00 pm to review the action plan and non-violence prior to the action, as well as to meet new activists.
RSVP: RSVPs are helpful in planning, but not mandatory. Bring a friend!

title: Sanctuary Volunteer Day
details: Get your hands dirty helping animals! Hop on board the caravan to Tamerlain Farm Sanctuary, a safe-haven for individuals rescued from the industries of abuse and exploitation. Cuddle with pigs, play with chickens, and get inspired by their stories.
RSVP: RSVP to Mansi to reserve a spot!

title: Philly Farmed Animal Save
details: Join us in bearing witness and paying respect to just a few of the billions of lives losts. The first Save Movement vigil in Philly we be hosts at a local slaughterhouse, signs and candles will be provided. Please wear black if possible. The event location will be released shortly before the event.
